getSchemaCell

public abstract SchemaCell getSchemaCell(java.lang.String cellName)
Finds a schema cell with the specified name. This method probably performs a linear search, thus the performance is poor if there are many cells on a line.

Parameters:
cellName - The name of the schema cell to find.
Returns:
The schema cell with the supplied name or null if no such cell was found.

findCell

protected static Cell findCell(Line line,
                               SchemaCell schemaCell,
                               int nSchemaCellIndex)
Finds the cell to use for output. Each cell is identified from the schema by the name of the cell. If the schema-cell has no name, the cell at the same position in the line is used under the condition that it also lacks name. If the schema-cell has a name the cell with the same name is used. If no such cell is found and the cell att the same position lacks name, it is used instead.

Parameters:
line - The line to find a cell within.
schemaCell - The schema-cell to use.
nSchemaCellIndex - The index at which the schema-cell is found.
Returns:
The cell within the supplied line to use for output according to the supplied schemaCell.

output

public abstract void output(Line line,
                            java.io.Writer writer)
                     throws java.io.IOException,
                            JSaParException
Writes a line to the writer. Each cell is identified from the schema by the name of the cell. If the schema-cell has no name, the cell at the same position in the line is used under the condition that it also lacks name. If the schema-cell has a name the cell with the same name is used. If no such cell is found and the cell at the same position lacks name, it is used instead. If no corresponding cell is found for a schema-cell, the cell is left empty. Sub-class decides how to treat empty cells.

Parameters:
line -
writer -
Throws:
java.io.IOException
JSaParException

isIgnoreReadEmptyLines

public boolean isIgnoreReadEmptyLines()

the ignoreReadEmptyLines

Parameters:

listener -
Returns:
